properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 10 at 8:36PM EST until February 13 at 2:12PM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Georgia...

Chattahoochee River near Columbus affecting Lee...Russell...
Chattahoochee and Muscogee Counties

Suwanee Creek near Suwanee affecting Gwinnett County

Sweetwater Creek near Austell affecting Cobb and Douglas Counties


.Recent heavy rainfall has caused significant runoff into streams and
rivers which will cause flooding in some areas.

The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a
* Flood Warning for
The Sweetwater Creek near Austell.
* From Tuesday morning until Thursday afternoon.
* At 7 PM Monday the stage was 5.5 feet, and rising.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 10 feet.
* The creek is forecast to rise above flood stage by tomorrow late
morning and continue to rise to near 12.9 feet by Wednesday
morning. The river will fall below flood stage by Thursday
morning.
* At 12 feet, minor flooding continues in the woodlands and fields
upstream and downstream from the gage near the Interstate 20
bridge. Portions of a paintball playing field just downstream of
the bridge and athletic fields in the Woodrow Wilson Park on Mount
Vernon Road are flooded with one to two feet of water. Water also
floods yards of four elevated homes along Mount Vernon Road. A
portion of Wren Circle in Douglas County, the County Iron Works,
and Sunlight Drive in Cobb County begin to flood.
properties.instruction:
All persons with interests along the river should monitor the latest
forecasts, and be prepared to take necessary precautions to protect
life and property.

The latest stage data was furnished in cooperation with the United
States Geological Survey.
